brief_summary.textblock:
This is a single center, randomized, blinded, placebo-controlled, two-period, cross-over
      study to evaluate the effect of pramlintide on satiety and food intake in normal-weight and
      obese non-diabetic subjects and in insulin-treated subjects with type 1 and type 2 diabetes.

clinical_study.brief_title: Evaluation of the Effect of Pramlintide on Satiety and Food Intake

criteria.textblock:
For Healthy Volunteers:

          -  BMI >=20 to <=25kg/m2 or >=30 to <=40 kg/m2

        For Subjects with Type 1 or Type 2 Diabetes:

          -  Treated with insulin for at least 6 months prior to screening

          -  HbA1c value between 6.5-10% inclusive

          -  BMI between 20-40kg/m2

clinical_study.official_title: A Single Center, Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Two-period, Crossover Study Evaluating the Acute Effect of Pramlintide on Satiety and Food Intake in Normal-weight and Obese Non-diabetic Subjects and in Insulin Treated Subjects With Type 1 and Type 2 Diabetes Mellitus

oversight_info.authority: United States: Food and Drug Administration

required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on June 04, 2014
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.study_design: Allocation: Randomized, Endpoint Classification: Efficacy Study, Intervention Model: Crossover Assignment, Masking: Double-Blind, Primary Purpose: Treatment
